message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1250000. This is a great price considering its value to me. I'm confident it will be a profitable acquisition for you. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money on this purchase. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I'm willing to work with you.  However, $900000 is significantly below my minimum price.  I'm prepared to come down to $1100000. This reflects a considerable discount from my initial offer and still allows you a good profit margin.  Let's see if we can make this work.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to you.

Bob, I've gone back and forth on this, but I'm still not comfortable going lower than $1000000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product, and I'm confident it will be a profitable purchase for you. This is my final offer.  If you're not able to meet that price, I'll be moving on to other buyers.
